purpose: Enable rapid and intelligent decision-making by processing and integrating multi-modal data efficiently.
principle: Leverages a combination of AI models and algorithms to process diverse data types and deliver quick, intelligent insights.
reusability: Offers a modular architecture with API endpoints for easy integration into existing systems, supports various data formats.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage; may have limited support for certain data types and lacks comprehensive documentation.
name: semantic-router
description: Superfast AI decision making and intelligent processing of multi-modal data.
highlight: Superfast decision-making for complex multi-modal data processing
